Text: Capitalist propaganda in favor of those who destroyed socialism in Poland to put instead a capitalist mafia and the catholic church in control. This priest belonged to the same church that even today has a Radio Maria that attacks the jews, even after the massacres of jews by the poles and the confiscations of their homes by the Germans that they never gave back. I am no jew but even todays jews are afraid to say they are because of the situation there. What a country ! They get what they deserve for their ignorance and religious superstition.
